headline.main: ALLIES KEEP CHECK ON PULSE OF ARABS; British Use Survey Methods in Iraq and Iran to Counter Old Axis Propaganda MOST NATIVE FOES SEIZED Rebel Chiefs Sentenced to Die, but Execution Is Delayed to Avert Unrest

lead_paragraph: BAGHDAD, Iraq, Jan. 28 (delayed) -- More effectively to combat the Axis propaganda flowering in Iraq and Iran from seeds planted in the last seven years, the British Public Relations Division, created in recent months, now is using the Gallup system of questioning all classes of Moslems on the effectiveness of the word battles being staged in this area.
abstract: Iraqi rebels rounded up and sentenced by Brit
